= Tests and update scripts for the productized Camel JBang Catalog

== Local testing

[source,shell]
----
# Set the local testing mode to avoid pushing to remotes
# and changing the state of the GitHub issues
export LOCAL_TEST=true

# Optionally replace the default repo
# https://github.com/redhat-camel/jbang-catalog.git
# with a local copy or a fork
JBANG_CATALOG_GIT_REPOSITORY=file:///home/$USER/orgs/redhat-camel-jbang-catalog/.git

mvn clean test
...
----
